name: CSSCGC - The "Find" Trilogy
description:
The "Find" Trilogy 2021 (CSSCGC Entry 2021)

This trilogy has 3 parts:

1. Find Santa : here you will learn the true story behind Santa Claus! Santa is real but he is not who you think!

2. Find Easter Bunny  : here you will learn the true story behind Easter Bunny! Easter Bunny is real but it is not what you think!

3. Find The Book  : Don't Panic! In the 3rd part you will learn the true story behind "The Book"!

By Firelord Quality Games!

* You will need a spectrum emulator to run this game! Just open the TAP/SNA/Z80/TZX file from within the emulator. (Eg. You can visit http://torinak.com/qaop press F9 and then select OPEN)

** This is a Crap Games Competition entry.It was never meant to be a serious game! You were warned! :)

*** You can find the source code for free in many ways!
